title: Looking for team or regular players
body:
Pretty casual and easy going, lvl 57, most of my mates have ditched League so im high and dry going solo. 
Strong with JNG-SUPP-ADC but can play all lanes fine, Mains Irelia, Noc, Kindred, MF, Swain and tank Supports.
Havn't played Ranked on the regular for a while (due to team mates) but have been smashing the last few weeks.

I'm on most nights so if your keen for a game hit me up -Toxotez-

replies.body: Add me I am also in the same predicament and have no one to play with

I have a club made for players like you, add me and ill invite you to the club, I hardly talk in it ive just made it for people that struggle finding team mates or duo's and for the silver players to talk to the gold/plat players for advice :)
I am keen, I am currently having some degree of health issues, but usually I play more.
